Body: I have a Moto G (2nd Generation) running Android 5.0.2.  I am new to both the device and to the Android OS, and would like to understand the meanings of the various notification icons present across the top of the home page of the device. Is there a list provided by Motorola or Google?Note: I know about this related question but that link is specifically for a Samsung Droid Charge model, and is also dated.Update: The link mentioned in the possible duplicate is a list of "suggested" icons from Google, and is not helpful.
Title: List of icons for Moto G 2nd Generation running Android 5.0.2

history.Text: I have a Moto G (2nd Generation) running Android 5.0.2.  I am new to both the device and to the Android OS, and would like to understand the meanings of the various notification icons present across the top of the home page of the device. Is there a list provided by Motorola or Google?Note: I know about this related [question][1] but that link is specifically for a Samsung Droid Charge model, and is also dated.  [1]: http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/12765/what-is-this-system-icon-that-looks-like-a-plus-inside-a-diamond-with-three-curv/
List of icons for Moto G 2nd Generation running Android 5.0.2

I have a Moto G (2nd Generation) running Android 5.0.2.  I am new to both the device and to the Android OS, and would like to understand the meanings of the various notification icons present across the top of the home page of the device. Is there a list provided by Motorola or Google?Note: I know about this related [question][1] but that link is specifically for a Samsung Droid Charge model, and is also dated.Update: The link mentioned in the possible duplicate is a list of "suggested" icons from Google, and is not helpful.  [1]: http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/12765/what-is-this-system-icon-that-looks-like-a-plus-inside-a-diamond-with-three-curv/
